com.io7m.r2.core

Class R2InstanceSingle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.r2.core.R2InstanceSingle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    R2InstanceSingleType, R2InstanceType

    @Generated(value={"Immutables.generator","R2InstanceSingleType"})
public final class R2InstanceSingle
extends Object
implements R2InstanceSingleType

    The type of single instances.

    A single instance consists of a set of one or more vertex buffers containing mesh data, a per-instance UV matrix, and a transform.
